code: import{getCookie}from'../helpers/cookieMetods';import{domain}from'./api';export const sendTestMail=emails=>{let token=getCookie('_form_token');let data=new FormData();data.append('token',`${token}`);data.append('emails',emails);return fetch(`${domain}/php/sendmail.php?action=test`,{method:'POST',body:data}).then(response=>{return response;});};export const getMailingTime=()=>{let token=getCookie('_form_token');let data=new FormData();data.append('token',`${token}`);return fetch(`${domain}/php/sendmail.php?action=gettime`,{method:'POST',body:data}).then(response=>{return response.json();}).then(result=>{return result;});};export const updateMailingTime=time=>{let token=getCookie('_form_token');let data=new FormData();data.append('token',`${token}`);data.append('time',time);return fetch(`${domain}/php/sendmail.php?action=settime`,{method:'POST',body:data}).then(response=>{return response;});};
